name: Dérive, Movement 3 [Vale of Memory] 2
description: Size: 5076 × 2834, 300x300, 20.4MB Year: 2014  Dérive, Movement 3 [Vale of Memory] 2 is part of a collection of moments pulled from The Cemetery Tapes.  The Cemetery Tapes are a collection of glitch videos created by the artist between 2012 and 2016. Utilizing a bespoke analog system, Parsons mixed video recordings, stills, and sketches documenting her movements through various Los Angeles cemeteries.
